mapper.sql: A.TENANT_ID, A.FACTORY_ID, A.BARCODE, A.BARCODE_ID, A.BARCODE_RULE_DICT_ID, A.BARCODE_STATUS_DICT_ID, A.PRODUCT_TYPE_DICT_ID, A.PRODUCT_ID, A.MATERIAL_ID, A.BARCODE_PACKBOX_ID, A.BATCH_NUMBER, A.PALLET_ID, A.BILL_TYPE_DICT_ID, A.BILL_ID, A.BILL_ITEM_ID, A.BILL_STATUS_DICT_ID, A.SUPPLIER_ID, A.WAREHOUSE_ID, A.LOCATION_ID, A.BILL_WORKORDER_ID, A.TASK_PROCEDURE_ID, A.PROCESS_ID, A.PROCESS_NODE_ID, A.INSTRUCT_ID, A.INSTRUCT_TYPE_DICT_ID, A.WORKSHOP_ID, A.WORKSHOP_AREA_ID, A.WORKSTATION_ID, A.EQUIP_WORK_ID, A.EQUIP_WORK_STACK_ID, A.EQUIP_FIXTURE_ID, A.EQUIP_FIXTURE_STACK_ID, A.COMPOSE_MATERIAL_ID, A.FROM_BARCODE, A.FROM_MATERIAL_ID, A.COMPOSE_BARCODE, A.QUANTITY, A.QUANTITY_STOCK, A.OPERATION_STATUS_DICT_ID, A.REMARK
mapper.select: SELECT next value for TRACK_BARCODE_SEQ AS IDValue
SELECT max(id) as maxId from TRACK_BARCODE

SELECT
FROM TRACK_BARCODE A WHERE (A.DEL_FLAG = 0) and (A.ID=#{id})
mapper.update:
UPDATE A SET
FROM TRACK_BARCODE A WHERE (A.ID=#{id})

UPDATE A SET
FROM TRACK_BARCODE A WHERE (1 = 1)

UPDATE TRACK_BARCODE SET TENANT_ID=#{tenantId}, FACTORY_ID=#{factoryId}, BARCODE=#{barcode}, BARCODE_ID=#{barcodeId}, BARCODE_RULE_DICT_ID=#{barcodeRuleDictId}, BARCODE_STATUS_DICT_ID=#{barcodeStatusDictId}, PRODUCT_TYPE_DICT_ID=#{productTypeDictId}, PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}, MATERIAL_ID=#{materialId}, BARCODE_PACKBOX_ID=#{barcodePackboxId}, BATCH_NUMBER=#{batchNumber}, PALLET_ID=#{palletId}, BILL_TYPE_DICT_ID=#{billTypeDictId}, BILL_ID=#{billId}, BILL_ITEM_ID=#{billItemId}, BILL_STATUS_DICT_ID=#{billStatusDictId}, SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId}, WAREHOUSE_ID=#{warehouseId}, LOCATION_ID=#{locationId}, BILL_WORKORDER_ID=#{billWorkorderId}, TASK_PROCEDURE_ID=#{taskProcedureId}, PROCESS_ID=#{processId}, PROCESS_NODE_ID=#{processNodeId}, INSTRUCT_ID=#{instructId}, INSTRUCT_TYPE_DICT_ID=#{instructTypeDictId}, WORKSHOP_ID=#{workshopId}, WORKSHOP_AREA_ID=#{workshopAreaId}, WORKSTATION_ID=#{workstationId}, EQUIP_WORK_ID=#{equipWorkId}, EQUIP_WORK_STACK_ID=#{equipWorkStackId}, EQUIP_FIXTURE_ID=#{equipFixtureId}, EQUIP_FIXTURE_STACK_ID=#{equipFixtureStackId}, COMPOSE_MATERIAL_ID=#{composeMaterialId}, FROM_BARCODE=#{fromBarcode}, FROM_MATERIAL_ID=#{fromMaterialId}, COMPOSE_BARCODE=#{composeBarcode}, QUANTITY=#{quantity}, QUANTITY_STOCK=#{quantityStock}, OPERATION_STATUS_DICT_ID=#{operationStatusDictId}, REMARK=#{remark},
WHERE ID=#{id} AND VERSION=#{version}

UPDATE TRACK_BARCODE SET
TENANT_ID=#{tenantId},
FACTORY_ID=#{factoryId},
BARCODE=#{barcode},
BARCODE_ID=#{barcodeId},
BARCODE_RULE_DICT_ID=#{barcodeRuleDictId},
BARCODE_STATUS_DICT_ID=#{barcodeStatusDictId},
PRODUCT_TYPE_DICT_ID=#{productTypeDictId},
PRODUCT_ID=#{productId},
MATERIAL_ID=#{materialId},
BARCODE_PACKBOX_ID=#{barcodePackboxId},
BATCH_NUMBER=#{batchNumber},
PALLET_ID=#{palletId},
BILL_TYPE_DICT_ID=#{billTypeDictId},
BILL_ID=#{billId},
BILL_ITEM_ID=#{billItemId},
BILL_STATUS_DICT_ID=#{billStatusDictId},
SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId},
WAREHOUSE_ID=#{warehouseId},
LOCATION_ID=#{locationId},
BILL_WORKORDER_ID=#{billWorkorderId},
TASK_PROCEDURE_ID=#{taskProcedureId},
PROCESS_ID=#{processId},
PROCESS_NODE_ID=#{processNodeId},
INSTRUCT_ID=#{instructId},
INSTRUCT_TYPE_DICT_ID=#{instructTypeDictId},
WORKSHOP_ID=#{workshopId},
WORKSHOP_AREA_ID=#{workshopAreaId},
WORKSTATION_ID=#{workstationId},
EQUIP_WORK_ID=#{equipWorkId},
EQUIP_WORK_STACK_ID=#{equipWorkStackId},
EQUIP_FIXTURE_ID=#{equipFixtureId},
EQUIP_FIXTURE_STACK_ID=#{equipFixtureStackId},
COMPOSE_MATERIAL_ID=#{composeMaterialId},
FROM_BARCODE=#{fromBarcode},
FROM_MATERIAL_ID=#{fromMaterialId},
COMPOSE_BARCODE=#{composeBarcode},
QUANTITY=#{quantity},
QUANTITY_STOCK=#{quantityStock},
OPERATION_STATUS_DICT_ID=#{operationStatusDictId},
REMARK=#{remark},
WHERE ID=#{id} AND VERSION=#{version}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TRACK_BARCODE ( ID, TENANT_ID, FACTORY_ID, BARCODE, BARCODE_ID, BARCODE_RULE_DICT_ID, BARCODE_STATUS_DICT_ID, PRODUCT_TYPE_DICT_ID, PRODUCT_ID, MATERIAL_ID, BARCODE_PACKBOX_ID, BATCH_NUMBER, PALLET_ID, BILL_TYPE_DICT_ID, BILL_ID, BILL_ITEM_ID, BILL_STATUS_DICT_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, WAREHOUSE_ID, LOCATION_ID, BILL_WORKORDER_ID, TASK_PROCEDURE_ID, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_NODE_ID, INSTRUCT_ID, INSTRUCT_TYPE_DICT_ID, WORKSHOP_ID, WORKSHOP_AREA_ID, WORKSTATION_ID, EQUIP_WORK_ID, EQUIP_WORK_STACK_ID, EQUIP_FIXTURE_ID, EQUIP_FIXTURE_STACK_ID, FROM_BARCODE, FROM_MATERIAL_ID, COMPOSE_BARCODE, COMPOSE_MATERIAL_ID, OPERATION_STATUS_DICT_ID, QUANTITY, QUANTITY_STOCK, REMARK, VERSION, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.factoryId}, #{item.barcode}, #{item.barcodeId}, #{item.barcodeRuleDictId}, #{item.barcodeStatusDictId}, #{item.productTypeDictId}, #{item.productId}, #{item.materialId}, #{item.barcodePackboxId}, #{item.batchNumber}, #{item.palletId}, #{item.billTypeDictId}, #{item.billId}, #{item.billItemId}, #{item.billStatusDictId}, #{item.supplierId}, #{item.warehouseId}, #{item.locationId}, #{item.billWorkorderId}, #{item.taskProcedureId}, #{item.processId}, #{item.processNodeId}, #{item.instructId}, #{item.instructTypeDictId}, #{item.workshopId}, #{item.workshopAreaId}, #{item.workstationId}, #{item.equipWorkId}, #{item.equipWorkStackId}, #{item.equipFixtureId}, #{item.equipFixtureStackId}, #{item.fromBarcode}, #{item.fromMaterialId}, #{item.composeBarcode}, #{item.composeMaterialId}, #{item.operationStatusDictId}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.quantityStock}, #{item.remark}, 1, 0, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.modifyUserId}, now(), now() )

update.foreach:
UPDATE TRACK_BARCODE
BARCODE_STATUS_DICT_ID=#{item.barcodeStatusDictId},
BILL_STATUS_DICT_ID=#{item.billStatusDictId},
QUANTITY_STOCK=#{item.quantityStock},
FACTORY_ID=#{item.factoryId},
LOCATION_ID=#{item.locationId},
WAREHOUSE_ID=#{item.warehouseId},
MODIFY_USER_ID=#{item.modifyUserId},
MODIFY_TIME=now(), VERSION = VERSION + 1
WHERE BARCODE=#{item.barcode}
AND BILL_ID=#{item.billId}
AND BILL_TYPE_DICT_ID=#{item.billTypeDictId}
